news.title: The case for more Fed rate cuts could rest on a 'systematic overcount' of jobs numbers
news.description: There are indications that policymakers will be more inclined to cut further if the labor market stays weak.

news.title: Dow jumps 600 points to record as Oracle sparks rush out of AI trade into broader market: Live updates
news.description: The S&P 500 fell as Oracle's results reignited fears about high-flying tech stocks.

news.title: Musk says SpaceX report of 2026 IPO is 'accurate'
news.description: Elon Musk ally Jared Isaacman looks set to be confirmed as the new NASA administrator after President Trump re-nominated him for the role.
